ldap.description: Properties associated with an LDAP IdP.

ldapObject.description: Properties associated with an LDAP IdP

default_page_limit.description: The default number of profiles to return from the profiles listing. If not configured, the service uses a default of 100.

user_search_prefix.description: The prefix to use when searching LDAP for users; by default, this is '(cn=*)'

user_search_supplemental_filter.description: A single filter clause to append to the user search filter, such as (host=foo.com); note that the string must be encased in parentheses.

user_search_filter.description: The entire user search filter, including the prefix and one or more supplemental filters. Use this instead of the user_search_prefix and user_search_suplemental_filter to support more complex filters. This must include the entire search filter, including & and parentheses. For example, '(&(cn=*)(host=foo.com))' or '(&(cn=*)(host=foo.org)(host=bar.org))'.
